ResearchProjectDef.label: Fish Industry: Aquaculture
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Fish Industry: Aquaculture provides you with of all the means to produce your own tasty seafood. Your colonists will learn how to adapt hydroponics into aquaculture basins to breed seafood.
- Unlocks the Aquaculture Basin. (Architect>Production>Aquaculture Basin)
ResearchProjectDef.descriptionDiscovered:
You have developed a modified version of the Hydroponic Basin: the Aquaculture Basin.
- You can now build the Aquaculture Basin to breed seafood. (Architect>Production>Aquaculture Basin)
